Html:
Hi,

How can I put an entire RibbonGroup in the Quick Access Toolbar, as shown in the Office Fluent UI Licensing Guidelines?

Thanks,
Alex

This is currently not fully implemented.
The QuickAccessToolbar is an Items control so putting the RibbonGroup in the QAT works.  However it doesn't become a drop down like the UI Guidelines says it should.  It's something that is being looked at and we plan to have included in the future.
